00033 struct opt {
00034   std::string help;
00035   int verbose;
00036   std::string progName;
00037   std::string version;
00038   std::string execGuid;
00039   std::string timeStr;
00040   std::string commandLine;
00041   std::string outDir;
00042   bool no_header;
00043   bool no_body;
00044   std::string cdfFile;
00045   vector<std::string> chp_files;
00046 };
00047

00056 void define_apt_chp_to_txt_options(PgOptions* opts)
00057 {
00058   ///@todo add force option
00059   opts->setUsage(
00060     "apt-chp-to-txt - Writes copynumber CHP files in tab-delimited text format.\n\n"
00061     "usage:\n"
00062     "   apt-chp-to-txt  \\\n"
00063     "       --o results --chp-files chpfiles.txt");
00064   opts->defineOption("h", "help", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00065                      "This message.",
00066                      "false");
00067   opts->defineOption("", "version", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00068                      "Display version information.",
00069                      "false");
00070   opts->defineOption("v", "verbose", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00071                      "How verbose to be with status messages 0 = quiet, 1 - usual messages, 2 - more messages.",
00072                      "1");
00073   opts->defineOption("o", "out-dir", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00074                      "Directory to write result files into.",
00075                      ".");
00076   opts->defineOption("", "cdf-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00077                      "CDF file to pull probe set names from.",
00078                      "");
00079   opts->defineOption("", "no-header", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT, "If set to true, then the file header will not be output.", "false");
00080   opts->defineOption("", "no-body", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT, "If set to true, then the file body will not be output.", "false");
00081   opts->defineOption("", "chp-files", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00082                      "Text file specifying chp files to process, one per line with the first line being 'chp_files'.",
00083                      "");
00084   opts->defineOption("", "log-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00085                      "The name of the log file. Generally defaults to the program name in the out-dir folder.",
00086                      "");
00087 }
00088 
00089 /**
00090  * Print out a little ditty for the given type of self documenting object.
00091  *
00092  * @param query - type of analysis/adjustment/summarization information is desired for.
00093  */
00094 
00095 void fillInOptions(PgOptions* pgopts, opt& opt)
00096 {
00097   // Standard stuff...
00098   opt.progName = pgopts->getProgName();
00099   opt.progName = Fs::basename(opt.progName);
00100   opt.timeStr = Util::getTimeStamp();
00101   if (pgopts->getBool("help") || pgopts->argc() == 1) {
00102     pgopts->usage();
00103     cout << endl << "version: " << opt.version << endl;
00104     exit(0);
00105   }
00106   if (pgopts->getBool("version")) {
00107     Verbose::out(0, "version: " + opt.version); exit(0);
00108   }
00109   opt.verbose = pgopts->getInt("verbose");
00110   Verbose::setLevel(opt.verbose);
00111   opt.outDir = pgopts->get("out-dir");
00112 
00113   opt.cdfFile = pgopts->get("cdf-file");
00114   opt.no_header = pgopts->getBool("no-header");
00115   opt.no_body = pgopts->getBool("no-body");
00116   if ((opt.no_header) && (opt.no_body)) {
00117     Err::errAbort("If you specify both --no-header and --no-body, then there will be no output.");
00118   }
00119 
00120   // Read in chp file list from other file if specified.
00121   std::string chpFiles_filename = pgopts->get("chp-files");
00122   if (chpFiles_filename != "") {
00123     affx::TsvFile::extractColToVec(chpFiles_filename, "chp_files", &opt.chp_files, 1);
00124     //
00125     Verbose::out(1, "Read " + ToStr(opt.chp_files.size()) + " chp files from: "
00126                  "'" + Fs::basename(chpFiles_filename) + "'");
00127   }
00128   // The rest of the args are celfiles.
00129   else {
00130     opt.chp_files = pgopts->getArgVector();
00131   }
00132 }
00133 
00134 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00135 {
00136   try {
00137     struct opt opt;
00138     PgOptions* pgopts = new PgOptions;
00139 
00140     define_apt_chp_to_txt_options(pgopts);
00141     pgopts->parseArgv(argv);
00142 
00143     opt.version = AptVersionInfo::versionToReport();
00144     opt.execGuid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00145     opt.commandLine = pgopts->commandLine();
00146 
00147     fillInOptions(pgopts, opt);
00148 
00149     time_t startTime = time(NULL);
00150     ofstream ostrmLog;
00151 
00152     Fs::ensureWriteableDirPath(opt.outDir);
00153 
00154     string strLogFileName;
00155     if (pgopts->get("log-file") != "") {
00156       strLogFileName = pgopts->get("log-file");
00157     } else {
00158       strLogFileName = Fs::join(opt.outDir, "apt-chp-to-txt.log");
00159     }
00160 
00161     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(ostrmLog, strLogFileName);
00162     LogStream log(3, &ostrmLog);
00163     Verbose::pushMsgHandler(&log);
00164     Verbose::pushProgressHandler(&log);
00165     Verbose::pushWarnHandler(&log);
00166     Verbose::out(3, "version=" + opt.version);
00167 
00168 #ifndef WIN32
00169     char name[8192];
00170     if (gethostname(name, ArraySize(name)) == 0) {
00171       Verbose::out(3, "host=" + ToStr(name));
00172     } else {
00173       Verbose::out(3, "host=unknown");
00174     }
00175     if (getcwd(name, ArraySize(name)) != NULL) {
00176       Verbose::out(3, "cwd=" + ToStr(name));
00177     } else {
00178       Verbose::out(3, "cwd=unknown");
00179     }
00180 #endif /* WIN32 */
00181 
00182     Verbose::out(3, "command-line=" + pgopts->commandLine());
00183     delete pgopts; pgopts = NULL;
00184 
00185     run(opt);
00186 
00187     time_t endTime = time(NULL);
00188     int t = int((float)(endTime - startTime) / 60.0 * 100);   // convert to minutes
00189     Verbose::out(1, ToStr("Run took approximately: ") + ToStr((float)t / 100) + ToStr(" minutes."));
00190     Verbose::out(1, "Closing log.");
00191     ostrmLog.close();
00192     return 0;
00193   } catch (...) {
00194     Verbose::out(1, "Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00195     return 1;
00196   }
00197   return 1;
00198 }
00199 
00200 bool isCalvinFile(const AffxString& strFileName)
00201 {
00202   AffxBinaryFile file;
00203   if (!file.open(strFileName, AffxBinaryFile::LOAD)) {
00204     return false;
00205   }
00206   unsigned char ucFileType = file.readUnsignedChar();
00207   file.close();
00208   if (ucFileType == 59) {
00209     return true;
00210   } else {
00211     return false;
00212   }
00213 }
00214 
00215 void run(opt& o)
00216 {
00217   for (unsigned int chp_index = 0; chp_index < o.chp_files.size(); chp_index++) {
00218     Verbose::out(1, "Processing file: " + o.chp_files[chp_index]);
00219     try {
00220       bool bSuccess = false;
00221       if (isCalvinFile(o.chp_files[chp_index])) {
00222         AffxByteArray chpFileName;
00223         chpFileName.assign(o.chp_files[chp_index]);
00224         CalvinToText converter;
00225         std::string outFile=Fs::join(o.outDir,Fs::basename(chpFileName.toString())+".txt");
00226         converter.run(o.chp_files[chp_index], 
00227                       outFile,
00228                       !o.no_header, 
00229                       !o.no_body, 
00230                       false);
00231       } else {
00232         bSuccess = doLegacy(o, chp_index);
00233       }
00234     } catch (...) {
00235       // Ios exception messages aren't very informative - just write
00236       Err::errAbort("A problem occurred while processing file (Exception thrown) " + o.chp_files[chp_index]);
00237     }
00238   }
00239 }
00240 
00241 bool readCdfFile(const AffxString& strFileName, bool bMapping, std::vector<std::string>& vProbeSetNames)
00242 {
00243   vProbeSetNames.clear();
00244   affxcdf::CCDFFileData cdf;
00245   cdf.SetFileName(strFileName.c_str());
00246   if (cdf.Read()) {
00247     int iUnitCount = cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
00248     vProbeSetNames.resize(iUnitCount);
00249     for (int iUnitIndex = 0; (iUnitIndex < iUnitCount); iUnitIndex++) {
00250       vProbeSetNames[iUnitIndex] = cdf.GetProbeSetName(iUnitIndex);
00251     }
00252   } else {
00253     Err::errAbort("Cannot read CDF file: " + strFileName);
00254   }
00255   return true;
00256 }
00257 
00258 
00259 bool doLegacy(opt& o, int chp_index)
00260 {
00261   bool bSuccessful = false;
00262   try {
00263     affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCHPData* chp = NULL;
00264     affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCHPLegacyData* data = NULL;
00265     chp = affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCHPDataReg::Read(o.chp_files[chp_index]);
00266     if (chp == NULL)
00267       Err::errAbort("Problem reading file '" + o.chp_files[chp_index] + "'");
00268     else {
00269       data = affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00270       if (data != NULL) {
00271         if (o.cdfFile != "") {
00272           colrow_t rowCount, colCount;
00273           int probeCount;
00274           int psCount;
00275           vector<string> chipTypes;
00276           EngineUtil::getCdfChipType(chipTypes, rowCount, colCount, probeCount, psCount, o.cdfFile);
00277           string observedChipType = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(data->GetHeader().GetChipType());
00278           if (!EngineUtil::checkChipTypeOk(observedChipType, chipTypes)) {
00279             string chipTypeString = "";
00280             for (int i = 0; i < chipTypes.size(); i++) {
00281               chipTypeString += chipTypes[i];
00282               if (i + 1 != chipTypes.size())
00283                 chipTypeString += ", ";
00284             }
00285             Verbose::out(1, "CHP File: " + o.chp_files[chp_index] + " (" + observedChipType + ")");
00286             Verbose::out(1, "CDF File: " + o.cdfFile + " (" + chipTypeString + ")");
00287             Err::errAbort("CDF chip type does not match CHP file.");
00288           }
00289         }
00290 
00291         AffxString chpFileName = (o.outDir != "" ? o.outDir + "/" : std::string("")) + Fs::basename(o.chp_files[chp_index]) + std::string(".txt");
00292         affx::TsvFile chpTsv;
00293         Verbose::out(1, "Writing file: " + chpFileName);
00294 
00295         if (!o.no_header) {
00296           ParameterNameValueType param;
00297           chpTsv.addHeader("Magic", ::getInt(data->GetHeader().GetMagic()));
00298           chpTsv.addHeader("ChipType", StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(data->GetHeader().GetChipType()));
00299           chpTsv.addHeader("AlgName", StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(data->GetHeader().GetAlgName()));
00300           chpTsv.addHeader("AlgVersion", StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(data->GetHeader().GetAlgVersion()));
00301           chpTsv.addHeader("ProgID" , StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(data->GetHeader().GetProgID()));
00302           chpTsv.addHeader("ParentCellFile", StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(data->GetHeader().GetParentCellFile()));
00303           chpTsv.addHeader("Cols" , ::getInt(data->GetHeader().GetCols()));
00304           chpTsv.addHeader("Cols" , ::getInt(data->GetHeader().GetCols()));
00305           chpTsv.addHeader("NumProbeSets" , ::getInt(data->GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets()));
00306           affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionTagValuePairTypeList list;
00307           data->GetHeader().AlgorithmParameters(list);
00308           affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator iter;
00309           for (iter = list.begin(); iter != list.end(); ++iter) {
00310             chpTsv.addHeader("affymetrix-algorithm-param-" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(iter->Tag) , StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(iter->Value));
00311           }
00312           data->GetHeader().SummaryParameters(list);
00313           for (iter = list.begin(); iter != list.end(); ++iter) {
00314             chpTsv.addHeader("affymetrix-chipsummary-" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(iter->Tag), StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(iter->Value));
00315           }
00316           affxchp::BackgroundZoneInfo info;
00317           data->GetHeader().GetBackgroundZoneInfo(info);
00318           chpTsv.addHeader("NumberBackgroundZones" , ::getInt(info.number_zones));
00319           chpTsv.addHeader("SmoothFactor" , ::getDouble(info.smooth_factor, 6));
00320           affxchp::BackgroundZoneTypeList::iterator iterBackground;
00321           int iIndex = 1;
00322           for (iterBackground = info.zones.begin(); iterBackground != info.zones.end(); ++iterBackground) {
00323             chpTsv.addHeader("ZoneType" + ::getInt(iIndex) , ::getDouble(iterBackground->centerx, 6) + "," + ::getDouble(iterBackground->centery, 6) + "," + ::getDouble(iterBackground->background, 6));
00324             iIndex++;
00325           }
00326           chpTsv.writeTsv_v2(chpFileName);
00327         } else {
00328           chpTsv.writeTsv(chpFileName);
00329         }
00330 
00331         if (!o.no_body) {
00332           doLegacyExpression(o, chpTsv, data);
00333           doLegacyGenotyping(o, chpTsv, data);
00334           doLegacyGenotyping(o, chpTsv, data);
00335           doLegacyUniversal(o, chpTsv, data);
00336           //        doLegacyReseq(o, chpTsv, data);
00337         }
00338         chpTsv.clear();
00339         delete chp;
00340       } else {
00341         Err::errAbort("A problem occurred while processing file (chp = NULL) " + o.chp_files[chp_index]);
00342       }
00343       bSuccessful = (data != NULL);
00344     }
00345   } catch (...) {
00346     Err::errAbort("A problem occurred while processing file (Exception thrown) " + o.chp_files[chp_index]);
00347   }
00348   return (bSuccessful);
00349 }
00350 
00351 
00352 void doLegacyExpression(opt& o, affx::TsvFile& chpTsv, affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCHPLegacyData* data)
00353 {
00354   std::vector<std::string> vProbeSetNames;
00355   if (o.cdfFile != "") {
00356     //Verbose::out(1, "Reading CDF file: " + o.cdfFile);
00357     readCdfFile(o.cdfFile, false, vProbeSetNames);
00358   }
00359   affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionExpressionProbeSetResults entry;
00360   bool bFound = true;
00361   int iIndex = 0;
00362   std::vector< std::string > arHeaders;
00363   arHeaders.push_back("Index");
00364   arHeaders.push_back("ProbeSetName");
00365   arHeaders.push_back("Signal");
00366   arHeaders.push_back("DetectionPValue");
00367   arHeaders.push_back("Detection");
00368   arHeaders.push_back("DetectionString");
00369   arHeaders.push_back("NumPairs");
00370   arHeaders.push_back("NumUsedPairs");
00371   arHeaders.push_back("NumCommonPairs");
00372   arHeaders.push_back("NumChangePValue");
00373   arHeaders.push_back("Change");
00374   arHeaders.push_back("ChangeString");
00375   arHeaders.push_back("SignalLogRatioLow");
00376   arHeaders.push_back("SignalLogRatioHigh");
00377 
00378   while ((bFound = data->GetExpressionResults(iIndex, entry))) {
00379     int iCidx = 0;
00380     if (iIndex == 0) {
00381       if (!entry.HasCompResults()) {
00382         arHeaders.resize(8);
00383       }
00384       if (vProbeSetNames.size() == 0) {
00385         arHeaders.erase(arHeaders.begin() + 1);
00386       }
00387       for (int i = 0; i < arHeaders.size(); i++) {
00388         chpTsv.defineColumn(0, i, arHeaders[i]);
00389       }
00390       chpTsv.writeColumnHeaders_clvl(0);
00391       chpTsv.flush();
00392     }
00393 
00394     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt(iIndex).c_str());
00395     if (vProbeSetNames.size() > 0) {
00396       if (iIndex >= (int)vProbeSetNames.size()) {
00397         Err::errAbort("A problem occurred while processing file (Wrong CDF file?)");
00398       }
00399       chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, vProbeSetNames[iIndex].c_str());
00400     }
00401     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(entry.GetSignal(), 6).c_str());
00402     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(entry.GetDetectionPValue(), 6).c_str());
00403     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt(entry.GetDetection()).c_str());
00404     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, entry.GetDetectionString().c_str());
00405     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt(entry.GetNumPairs()).c_str());
00406     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt(entry.GetNumUsedPairs()).c_str());
00407     if (entry.HasCompResults()) {
00408       chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt(entry.GetNumCommonPairs()).c_str());
00409       chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(entry.GetChangePValue(), 6).c_str());
00410       chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt(entry.GetChange()).c_str());
00411       chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, entry.GetChangeString().c_str());
00412       chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(entry.GetSignalLogRatio(), 6).c_str());
00413       chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(entry.GetSignalLogRatioLow(), 6).c_str());
00414       chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(entry.GetSignalLogRatioHigh(), 6).c_str());
00415     }
00416     chpTsv.writeLevel(0);
00417     iIndex++;
00418   }
00419   if ((iIndex > 0) && (vProbeSetNames.size() > 0)) {
00420     if (iIndex != (int)vProbeSetNames.size()) {
00421       chpTsv.clear();
00422       Err::errAbort("A problem occurred while processing file (Wrong CDF file?)");
00423     }
00424   }
00425 }
00426 
00427 void doLegacyGenotyping(opt& o, affx::TsvFile& chpTsv, affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCHPLegacyData* data)
00428 {
00429   std::vector<std::string> vProbeSetNames;
00430   if (o.cdfFile != "") {
00431     //Verbose::out(1, "Reading CDF file: " + o.cdfFile);
00432     readCdfFile(o.cdfFile, true, vProbeSetNames);
00433   }
00434   affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionGenotypeProbeSetResults g;
00435   bool bFound = true;
00436   int iIndex = 0;
00437   std::vector< std::string > arHeaders;
00438   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("Index"));
00439   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("ProbeSetName"));
00440   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("AlleleCall"));
00441   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("AlleleCallString"));
00442   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("Confidence"));
00443   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("PValueAA"));
00444   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("PValueAB"));
00445   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("PValueBB"));
00446   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("RAS1"));
00447   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("RAS2"));
00448 
00449   while ((bFound = data->GetGenotypingResults(iIndex, g))) {
00450     int iCidx = 0;
00451     if (iIndex == 0) {
00452       if (vProbeSetNames.size() == 0) {
00453         arHeaders.erase(arHeaders.begin() + 1);
00454       }
00455       for (int i = 0; i < arHeaders.size(); i++) {
00456         chpTsv.defineColumn(0, i, arHeaders[i]);
00457       }
00458       chpTsv.writeColumnHeaders_clvl(0);
00459       chpTsv.flush();
00460     }
00461     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt(iIndex).c_str());
00462     if (vProbeSetNames.size() > 0) {
00463       if (iIndex >= (int)vProbeSetNames.size()) {
00464         Err::errAbort("A problem occurred while processing file (Wrong CDF file?)");
00465       }
00466       chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, vProbeSetNames[iIndex].c_str());
00467     }
00468     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt(g.GetAlleleCall()).c_str());
00469     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, g.GetAlleleCallString().c_str());
00470     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(g.GetConfidence(), 6).c_str());
00471     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(g.GetPValueAA(), 6).c_str());
00472     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(g.GetPValueAB(), 6).c_str());
00473     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(g.GetPValueBB(), 6).c_str());
00474     //      chpTsv.set(0,iCidx++,::getDouble(g.GetPValueNoCall(), 6).c_str());
00475     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(g.GetRAS1(), 6).c_str());
00476     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(g.GetRAS2(), 6).c_str());
00477     chpTsv.writeLevel(0);
00478     iIndex++;
00479 
00480   }
00481   if ((iIndex > 0) && (vProbeSetNames.size() > 0)) {
00482     if (iIndex != (int)vProbeSetNames.size()) {
00483       chpTsv.clear();
00484       Err::errAbort("A problem occurred while processing file (Wrong CDF file?)");
00485     }
00486   }
00487 }
00488 
00489 void doLegacyUniversal(opt& o, affx::TsvFile& chpTsv, affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCHPLegacyData* data)
00490 {
00491   std::vector<std::string> vProbeSetNames;
00492   if (o.cdfFile != "") {
00493     //Verbose::out(1, "Reading CDF file: " + o.cdfFile);
00494     readCdfFile(o.cdfFile, false, vProbeSetNames);
00495   }
00496   affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionUniversalProbeSetResults entry;
00497   std::vector< std::string > arHeaders;
00498   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("Index"));
00499   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("ProbeSetName"));
00500   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("BackGround"));
00501 
00502   bool bFound = true;
00503   int iIndex = 0;
00504   while ((bFound = data->GetUniversalResults(iIndex, entry))) {
00505     int iCidx = 0;
00506     if (iIndex == 0) {
00507       if (vProbeSetNames.size() == 0) {
00508         arHeaders.erase(arHeaders.begin() + 1);
00509       }
00510       for (int i = 0; i < arHeaders.size(); i++) {
00511         chpTsv.defineColumn(0, i, arHeaders[i]);
00512       }
00513       chpTsv.writeColumnHeaders_clvl(0);
00514       chpTsv.flush();
00515     }
00516     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt(iIndex).c_str());
00517     if (vProbeSetNames.size() > 0) {
00518       if (iIndex >= (int)vProbeSetNames.size()) {
00519         Err::errAbort("A problem occurred while processing file (Wrong CDF file?)");
00520       }
00521       chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, vProbeSetNames[iIndex].c_str());
00522     }
00523     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(entry.GetBackground(), 6).c_str());
00524     chpTsv.writeLevel(0);
00525     iIndex++;
00526   }
00527   if ((iIndex > 0) && (vProbeSetNames.size() > 0)) {
00528     if (iIndex != (int)vProbeSetNames.size()) {
00529       chpTsv.clear();
00530       Err::errAbort("A problem occurred while processing file (Wrong CDF file?)");
00531     }
00532   }
00533 }
00534 
00535 void doLegacyReseq(opt& o, affx::TsvFile& chpTsv, affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCHPLegacyData* data)
00536 {
00537   std::vector<std::string> vProbeSetNames;
00538   if (o.cdfFile != "") {
00539     //Verbose::out(1, "Reading CDF file: " + o.cdfFile);
00540     readCdfFile(o.cdfFile, false, vProbeSetNames);
00541   }
00542   affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionResequencingResults entry;
00543   bool bFound = true;
00544   int iIndex = 0;
00545   std::vector< std::string > arHeaders;
00546   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("Index"));
00547   arHeaders.push_back(std::string("ProbeSetName"));
00548 
00549   while ((bFound = data->GetReseqResults(entry))) {
00550     int iCidx = 0;
00551     if (iIndex == 0) {
00552       if (vProbeSetNames.size() == 0) {
00553         arHeaders.erase(arHeaders.begin() + 1);
00554       }
00555       for (int i = 0; i < arHeaders.size(); i++) {
00556         chpTsv.set(0, i, arHeaders[i]);
00557       }
00558       chpTsv.writeLevel(0);
00559     }
00560     chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt(iIndex).c_str());
00561     if (vProbeSetNames.size() > 0) {
00562       if (iIndex >= (int)vProbeSetNames.size()) {
00563         Err::errAbort("A problem occurred while processing file (Wrong CDF file?)");
00564       }
00565       chpTsv.set(0, iCidx++, vProbeSetNames[iIndex].c_str());
00566     }
00567 
00568     chpTsv.writeLevel(0);
00569     iIndex++;
00570   }
00571 
00572   if ((iIndex > 0) && (vProbeSetNames.size() > 0)) {
00573     if (iIndex != (int)vProbeSetNames.size()) {
00574       chpTsv.clear();
00575       Err::errAbort("A problem occurred while processing file (Wrong CDF file?)");
00576     }
00577   }
00578 }
